stories.title: Lost city
stories.body: My phone rang at midnight. I remember it clearly. I was chatting with Liz when it rang. Liz is my sister. It's a kind of a habit for us chatting late in the evening.
stories.author: Jane Wheels

stories.title: Scarecrow
stories.body: I heard those noises again this night. It was the third time I'd heard them. First I thought it was some birds on the roof. You know, crows build their nests in attics sometimes, and their young make those noises, like a baby crying.
stories.author: Thomas Hills
